backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with access control, user profiles, dance classes, sessions, bookings, and video lesson state plus CRUD-style methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables and dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining routes, layout, role-gated pages, and profile setup triggering.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access-denied message with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for creating a user profile with mutation to backend and validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Checks user role and only allows admin to access protected children, otherwise shows loading or access denied.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Triggers session booking, handling login if needed and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/classes/ClassEdi: Dialog form for creating a new dance class and submitting it via mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/instructor/Sessi: Static panel prompting instructors to select a session to view its roster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying branding, attribution, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, auth controls, profile display, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/lessons/LessonEd: Dialog form to create and upload a new video lesson using a mutation and showing toasts.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayForB: Creates a Stripe checkout session for a booking and redirects the user to pay.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Dialog for scheduling a new class session, selecting class details and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch the caller's user role and admin status from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile via the actor and returns loading and fetched states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for dance classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, and Stripe config using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Defines mutations to create Stripe checkout sessions and fetch session status through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleManage: Admin UI for viewing the current role and assigning roles to principals.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentSetupPag: Admin UI for viewing Stripe setup status and configuring Stripe secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Displays a user's bookings, handling login checks, loading states, and booking status badges with navigation and payment options.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/CatalogPage.t: Shows all dance classes with search and filter controls, rendering a hero section and a list of filtered class cards.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/ClassDetailPa: Displays detailed information for a specific dance class and lists upcoming sessions with booking options.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/Instructor: Instructor dashboard for managing classes and sessions, including creation dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/ManageLess: Interface for instructors to view, create, and manage video lessons with a lesson editor dialog.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonDe: Shows a single video lesson's details with embedded video playback and instructor/duration info.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonsP: Displays video lessons with search and style filtering, showing loading skeletons and navigating to lesson detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a payment-cancelled message with buttons to view bookings or return to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Displays a payment-success message, invalidates booking/session queries, and links to bookings or home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-stored parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for app-wide styling.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, requirements, and image needs for the dance classes application.
